reviewText: Purchased this as a Christmas gift for my nephew. He loved it!

This video truly has excellent cinematography and shows all three match sets in their entirety.  No highlights only here.  The only downfall (reason why I gave the video a 4 instead of a 5) is that only the semi-final and finals matches are shown.  That means you only get to see the top four teams play.  Eight are advertised.  Not to ruin it, but no Navy and no Drexel here.

Excellant DVD. Stop wasting your time with other pointless DVD's and see where its at. College Paintball is INSANE! See your favorite colleges DUKE it out in all out battle! this dvd is great, good moves, great shooting, and of coruse BIG MIKE!!! woot woot!

This is probably the best paintball dvd I have seen so far. It's fun to see the best college paintball teams battle it out for the championship title at Disney's Wide World of Sports Complex.

-good cinematography

-good announcing

-good action

not much more you could ask for.
